summary: A collection of benchmark suites for Qiskit Pulse that measure the execution time of loading default pulse configurations, constructing echoed crossâ€‘resonance gate circuits with parameterized pulse schedules, and lowering pulse schedules into Qobj representations. The benchmarks include utilities for generating sample quantum circuits and setting up a consistent pulse environment to obtain performance metrics.
business_intent: Supply developers and performance engineers with quantitative data on critical Qiskit Pulse operations, enabling identification of bottlenecks and guiding optimization efforts for faster configuration loading, schedule creation, and schedule conversion.
